data.lyric:
[ti:Worst Day (Explicit)]
[ar:Future]
[al:Worst Day (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Worst Day (Explicit) - Future
[00:01.55]Lyrics by：Nayvadius Wilburn/Wesley Glass/Taurus Currie
[00:03.10]Composed by：Nayvadius Wilburn/Wesley Glass/Taurus Currie
[00:04.66]Valentine's is the worst day
[00:06.35]
[00:10.06]Valentine's Day the worst day got too many to please
[00:12.85]I popped a half a pink pill and put my mind at ease
[00:15.65]I bought you all these gifts chain your heart all in pieces
[00:18.35]Try to pass out new whips yeah but all you want is me
[00:21.01]Got a Glock under her pillow she blowing for my gang
[00:23.38]
[00:23.94]Not tryna lie to you I don't wanna explain
[00:26.59]Took off on a store run and jumped on a plane
[00:29.26]Every single birthday another private location
[00:31.96]Valentine's Day the worst day got too many to please
[00:34.61]Spent over a hunnit Gs and she still wasn't pleased
[00:37.15]I done gave her a hundred Gs all she want is me
[00:39.96]It's a treat when we meet up whenever we meet
[00:42.81]She want me to be there on February 14
[00:45.42]I come through and I get a chance but you gotta be brief
[00:48.04]Tote a LV briefcase I'm just keeping it a G
[00:50.93]Made it out the trenches got more stripes than a zebra
[00:53.37]When you got more than one two three four five six b***hes
[00:56.51]Valentine's Day the worst day when a n***a rich
[00:59.07]Got more than one got Catholics got Christians
[01:01.60]Got a Muslim got Egyptians they saying they miss me
[01:04.43]Won't settle for no quickie got 'em waiting up in they vickies
[01:07.18]I leave out and go missing
[01:08.46]I done traveled a long distance bought a house in another city
[01:10.88]Tried to talk to you but I know you won't get it
[01:13.26]I know if it don't kill you you gon' feel it
[01:15.35]Valentine's Day the worst day got too many to please
[01:17.91]I popped a half a pink pill and put my mind at ease
[01:20.61]I bought you all these gifts chain your heart all in pieces
[01:23.35]Try to pass out new whips yeah but all you want is me
[01:25.94]Got a Glock under her pillow she blowing for my gang
[01:29.01]Not tryna lie to you I don't wanna explain
[01:31.69]Took off on a store run and jumped on a plane
[01:34.46]Every single birthday another private location
[01:36.65]
[01:37.34]Through the laughing and the cheering praying for a better day
[01:40.01]I'm getting mine getting it in smashing on acceleration
[01:42.79]Do it times ten upper echelon heavyweight
[01:45.47]Working out my differences with hard work and dedication
[01:48.23]Long distance in and out whenever we link up
[01:50.83]Trench to the floor keep a ho to pick my mink up
[01:53.49]Make reservations just to check in my coat
[01:55.86]My inspiration never let it drag on the floor
[01:58.79]I'm turning up some more I done been too d**n broke
[02:01.23]Feel like I'm God-level so many chicks I adore
[02:03.85]
[02:04.43]Avoiding the hurt riding in circles in a Aventador
[02:07.03]Choose one and you gon' make the other ones feel less important
[02:09.52]Valentine's Day the worst day got too many to please
[02:11.91]Too many to please
[02:12.55]I popped a half a pink pill and put my mind at ease
[02:14.61]Put my mind at ease
[02:15.21]I bought you all these gifts chain your heart all in pieces
[02:17.07]Chain your heart all in pieces
[02:17.98]Try to pass out new whips yeah but all you want is me
[02:19.86]All you want is me
[02:20.48]Got a Glock under her pillow she blowing for my gang
[02:22.65]Blow for my gang
[02:23.34]Not tryna lie to you I don't wanna explain
[02:25.57]Don't wanna explain
[02:26.20]Took off on a store run and jumped on a plane
[02:28.28]Jumped on a jet
[02:28.93]Every single birthday another private location
[02:31.02]Private location
[02:31.47]
[02:32.44]Oh ooh
[02:33.83]Forever my lady
[02:34.41]
[02:36.34]Woo ooh
[02:37.95]
[02:38.88]Forever my lady
[02:39.87]
[02:41.88]Woo ooh
[02:42.60]
[02:43.46]Valentine's Day the worst day got too many to please
[02:46.05]I popped a half a pink pill and put my mind at ease
[02:48.82]I bought you all these gifts tear your heart all in pieces
[02:51.47]Had to pass out new whips yeah but all you want is me
[02:54.14]Valentine's Day the worst day
data.trans:
[ti:Worst Day (Explicit)]
[ar:Future]
[al:Worst Day (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.55]//
[00:03.10]//
[00:04.66]情人节 最糟糕的日子
[00:06.35]
[00:10.06]情人节 最糟糕的日子 要费尽心思去讨那些女孩的欢心
[00:12.85]我吃了半片粉色药片 让我的心情放松平静
[00:15.65]我给你们都买了礼物 将你们的心都串在一起
[00:18.35]我想送你新款跑车 但你只想要我
[00:21.01]她的枕头下面放了把格洛克 她为我的帮派拿枪射击
[00:23.38]
[00:23.94]我没有过对你撒谎的打算 我不想解释太多
[00:26.59]狂欢一夜后偷偷溜走 坐上飞机
[00:29.26]每一次生日 都会去不同的私人场所
[00:31.96]情人节 最糟糕的日子 要费尽心思去讨那些女孩的欢心
[00:34.61]我为她挥金如土 可她依然没有满足
[00:37.15]我给了她大笔金钱 她想要的就只有我
[00:39.96]我们无论何时见面 我都要好好款待你一番
[00:42.81]她想在二月十四跟我见面
[00:45.42]我来了 我有机会 但你得长话短说
[00:48.04]拿着LV的公文包 我只是在保持风度
[00:50.93]我出身自鱼龙混杂的贫民窟 我酷到不行
[00:53.37]当你左拥右抱 身边美女如云
[00:56.51]情人节 最糟糕的日子 当某个有钱的家伙
[00:59.07]交往过不止一个人 交往过天主教徒 基督教徒
[01:01.60]交往过穆斯林 埃及人 她们说她们想我
[01:04.43]我不会接受速战速决 让这些漂亮女孩都乖乖等着
[01:07.18]我离开 消失不见
[01:08.46]我来了次长途旅行 在另一座城市买了一栋房子
[01:10.88]我想跟你谈谈 但我知道你不会懂我的意思
[01:13.26]我知道如果你没有因此死心 你会感觉到的
[01:15.35]情人节 最糟糕的日子 要费尽心思去讨那些女孩的欢心
[01:17.91]我吃了半片粉色药片 让我的心情放松平静
[01:20.61]我给你们都买了礼物 将你们的心都串在一起
[01:23.35]我想送你新款跑车 但你只想要我
[01:25.94]她的枕头下面放了把格洛克 她为我的帮派拿枪射击
[01:29.01]我没有过对你撒谎的打算 我不想解释太多
[01:31.69]狂欢一夜后偷偷溜走 坐上飞机
[01:34.46]每一次生日 都会去不同的私人场所
[01:36.65]
[01:37.34]通过欢笑声和欢呼声 祈祷明天更加美好
[01:40.01]我也有了自己的幸福 开始了新生活 我加快速度
[01:42.79]努力了数十次 高层人物 重量级人物
[01:45.47]我凭借自己的辛苦工作和奉献 让自己变得与众不同
[01:48.23]无论何时我们取得联系 都要跨越遥远距离
[01:50.83]出身贫寒 然后功成名就 带上一个小妞 穿上我的貂皮大衣
[01:53.49]订好房间 只为了寄存我的外套
[01:55.86]我的灵感 我绝不会将它丢到地板上践踏
[01:58.79]我更加热情了起来 我不会再过贫穷日子了
[02:01.23]感觉我如同神明一般 我有那么多喜欢的姑娘
[02:03.85]
[02:04.43]避免受伤 开着车绕圈圈
[02:07.03]选择了一个 你会让别的女孩觉得自己没那么重要
[02:09.52]情人节 最糟糕的日子 要费尽心思去讨那些女孩的欢心
[02:11.91]费尽心思去讨欢心

[02:14.61]让我的心情放松平静
